00022 #include "Common/Error.h"

00025 #include "AsyncComm/ResponseCallback.h"

00028 #include "RequestHandlerPread.h"

00030 using namespace Hypertable;
00031 using namespace Hypertable::DfsBroker;
00032 
00036 void RequestHandlerPread::run() {
00037   ResponseCallbackRead cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00038   uint32_t fd, amount;
00039   uint64_t offset;
00040   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00041   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00042 
00043   if (remaining < 16)
00044     goto abort;
00045 
00046   // fd
00047   Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &fd);
00048 
00049   // offset
00050   Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &offset);
00051 
00052   // amount
00053   Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &amount);
00054 
00055   m_broker->pread(&cb, fd, offset, amount);
00056 
00057   return;
00058 
00059  abort:
00060   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with PREAD message");
00061   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with PREAD message");
00062   return;
00063 }
